author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister N. Rangasamy on Thursday expressed the people would continue to repose faith on his government in the coming year.

Greeting the people on the eve of New Year, Mr. Rangasamy recalled the efforts taken by his regime for the welfare of all sections of the people.

The Chief Minister said, “AINRC Government proved that it is people’s government through its transparent and honest administration. (I am) overwhelmed to see that my government has earned good name among the people and etched in their hearts. The government brought several welfare programmes to the people. Success of those programmes was achieved only because the people have strong faith and affection towards the government.”

Wish

The Chief Minister said, “It is my wish that people’s faith and love towards my government to continue in the coming years too.” He also expressed his wish would be fulfilled in the New Year.

He greeted the people on the eve of New Year recalling his govt’s efforts
title: CM hopeful of residents’ faith in govt
